p: At first, the docking was performed with the co-crystal structure of 2019-nCoV i.e. M pro with N3 peptide and the docked complex was superimposed with the native co-crystal structure, M pro with N3 peptide complex, the superimposition has 0.923Å RMSD, which precisely coincided with each other ( Figure 3A). Whereas, N3 peptide have ∼98% identical interactions in a superimposed complex within a 4Å region of molecular binding-site of domains I and II ( Figure 3B).
